contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=September 2008}} '''Zehista''' is a subdivision of the [[Germany|German]] municipality of [[Pirna]]. It was incorporated into Pirna in 1922. Zehista was founded in 1355. The name originates from the [[Slavic language]]. <gallery> Image:Zehista um 1860 (01).jpg|Zehista around 1860 Image:Zehista (03) 2006-06.jpg|Zehista 2006 </gallery> {{SÃ¤chsischeSchweizOsterzgebirge-geo-stub}} {{coord|50|56|25|N|13|55|35|E|region:DE-SN_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Pirna]] [[Category:1355 establishments]] [[Category:Populated places established in the 1350s]]
